attributes.action: Ask HM Revenue and Customs to stop wasting taxpayers money on postage!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are a firm of chartered accountants and act as agents to many businesses and individuals for tax purposes. HMRC send us thousands of documents each year, all from the same few tax offices, wasting tons of paper and taxpayer funds on paper, when this could all be done via email or some other electronic form.

Given that we are currently in a recession, and are spending £trillions on bailing out banks, the government should not be wasting £millions on postage and paper by sending out seperate notifications for each and every client/event.
